Contact.heading: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Have a question or want to work with us? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

questions.question: Is this template free?
questions.answer: Yes. It's a free NextJS Shadcn template.

questions.question: Can I use this template for commercial projects?
questions.answer: Yes, this template is available for both personal and commercial use.

questions.question: How do I customize the colors?
questions.answer: You can customize colors by modifying the theme configuration in your project files.

questions.question: Is this template responsive?
questions.answer: Yes, the template is fully responsive and works on all devices.

questions.question: How often does this template get updated?
questions.answer: We update the template regularly to fix bugs and add new features.

Register.title: Register
Register.successDescription: You can now log in to your account and start exploring our courses.

Login.title: Login
Login.successDescription: You can now access your account and start exploring our courses.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.profileNotFoundDescription: The profile you're looking for could not be found or you don't have permission to view it.

CoursesPage.title: Courses
CoursesPage.description: Browse our collection of courses to enhance your skills

CoursePage.linkCopiedDescription: The link has been copied to your clipboard.
CoursePage.learningObjectivesDescription: By the end of this course, you will be able to understand the key concepts and apply them in real-world scenarios.
CoursePage.courseRequirementsDescription: To get the most out of this course, you should have a basic understanding of the subject matter. No prior experience is required, but familiarity with related concepts will be beneficial.
CoursePage.previewCourseContentDescription: This course covers a wide range of topics, including but not limited to:

PaymentPage.title: Course Payment
PaymentPage.subtitle: Complete your enrollment
PaymentPage.paymentSuccessfulDescription: You have successfully enrolled in this course.
PaymentPage.paymentFailedDescription: Something went wrong with your payment. Please try again.
PaymentPage.paymentRequiredDescription: Please complete the payment to enroll in this course.

hero.title: eCampus
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive Educational Platform for Training and Development
hero.description: Preparing Students and Graduates for the Job Market

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At eCampus, we strive to empower the next generation of professionals by providing them with the skills and practical experience needed to succeed in the ever-changing job market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We work to bridge the gap between academic education and job market requirements by providing specialized training programs, professional educational courses, and opportunities for practical application.

features.title: What Sets Us Apart?
features.quality: High-Quality Content: Designed by experts in their fields
features.personalized: Personal Guidance: Customized support for each learner
features.network: Professional Network: Connect with colleagues and professionals in your field

students.title: Develop Your Skills and Be Job Market Ready
students.description: With us, you'll have the opportunity to learn skills required in the job market, connect with companies, and build a strong resume.

opportunities.title: Employment Opportunities
opportunities.description: Direct contact with companies and institutions

projects.title: Practical Projects
projects.description: Apply skills in a realistic environment

instructors.title: Share Your Expertise and Help Develop Talent
instructors.description: We provide you with an integrated platform to deliver courses in your field, build your reputation as an expert, and interact with enthusiastic learners.
benefits: Design and deliver courses in your area of expertise
Access to thousands of interested students
Integrated tools for managing virtual classrooms
Opportunities to collaborate with other experts

cta.title: Be Part of the Future of Education
cta.description: Whether you're a student seeking to develop your skills or an expert looking to share your knowledge, eCampus is your ideal environment for professional growth and development.

CourseViewer.noContentDescription: This course does not have any content yet.
CourseViewer.selectLesson: Select a lesson to view the content
CourseViewer.contentLockedDescription: Enroll in this course to access all lessons and resources

errorMessages.NotEnrolled: You are not enrolled in this course.
